      • sendReminderEmail

        private void sendReminderEmail(Phase.PhaseName phaseName,
                               java.lang.Integer changeRequestId,

                               java.lang.String content)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException,
                               javax.mail.MessagingException

        phaseName - the phase name of the request
        changeRequestId - the id of the change request
        getEmailRs - ResultSet object, containing the database result
        content - email content
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if ResultSet get info fail
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if sending email fail
